channel.title: CVE Feed for themegrill -- ColorMag
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themegrill -- ColorMag

item.title: CVE-2024-2500|2024-03-22T01:59:59.216Z -- themegrill -- colormag
item.description: The ColorMag theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via a user's Display Name in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authentciated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
